fulltext: oai:lindat.mff.cuni.cz:11372/LRT-292;2016-04-06T16:39:54Z;hdl_11858_00-097C-0000-0007-710A-A;hdl_11858_00-097C-0000-0007-710B-8;repetitiveness checker;Jongejan, Bart;1) Finds repeated sequences of words in documents (repetitiveness checker) 2) Finds common sequences of words in several documents (version comparison) A sequence of words consists of minimally two words. There is no upper limit of the number of words in a sequence, but sequences do not transgress sentence delimiters. There are several weight functions to choose from, each defining "good" sequences in a different way, based on word frequency, sequence lenght and number of repetitions.;2014-07-30;toolService;http://hdl.handle.net/11372/LRT-292;downloadable_files_count: 0;Denmark;Center for Sprogteknologi,  University of Copenhagen;http://cst.dk/tools/
name: 657fc9c4-abe7-58c4-ae9a-450f488e9927
notes: 1) Finds repeated sequences of words in documents (repetitiveness checker) 2) Finds common sequences of words in several documents (version comparison) A sequence of words consists of minimally two words. There is no upper limit of the number of words in a sequence, but sequences do not transgress sentence delimiters. There are several weight functions to choose from, each defining "good" sequences in a different way, based on word frequency, sequence lenght and number of repetitions.
title: repetitiveness checker
